attributes.action: To take action on the E-petitions signed by British Subjects as British Prime Minister and not be governed by EU regulations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The best example being the road pricing petion. Two other examples: replacing the DEFRA cut in funding to British Waterways (the answer was waffle) and the imposition of tax on red diesel ('no scope for overturning decision')  despite the PM saying he is against it. If HE is against the tax then don't do it! HE was voted into power to act on OUR behalf not the European Commission or other EU departments.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
